messages.alpha: The field may only contain alphabetic characters
messages.alpha_num: The field may only contain alpha-numeric characters
messages.alpha_dash: The field may contain alpha-numeric characters as well as dashes and underscores
messages.alpha_spaces: The field may only contain alphabetic characters as well as spaces
messages.between: The field must be between {min} and {max}
messages.confirmed: The field confirmation does not match
messages.digits: The field must be numeric and exactly contain {length} digits
messages.dimensions: The field must be {width} pixels by {height} pixels
messages.email: The field must be a valid email
messages.excluded: The field is not a valid value
messages.ext: The field is not a valid file
messages.image: The field must be an image
messages.integer: The field must be an integer
messages.max_value: The field must be {max} or less
messages.max: The field may not be greater than {length} characters
messages.mimes: The field must have a valid file type
messages.min_value: The field must be {min} or more
messages.min: The field must be at least {length} characters
messages.numeric: The field may only contain numeric characters
messages.oneOf: The field is not a valid value
messages.over: The field must have at least {length} option(s)
messages.size: The field size must be less than {size}KB
messages.under: The field must have less than {length} options
